english_translation: As science grows, there are hundreds of conveniences;

kannada_original: ಕಸದ ಸಂಗತಿ ಅಂತೆ ಇದೆ ರಾಶಿ ರಾಶಿ.
english_transliteration: Kasada saṅgati ante ide rāśi rāśi.
english_translation: Similarly, there are heaps and heaps of trash (useless information).

kannada_original: ತೂರಿ ಜಳ್ಳನು ಅತ್ತ, ಅರಸು ಕಾಳನು ಇತ್ತ
english_transliteration: Tūri jaḷḷanu atta, arasu kāḷanu itta
english_translation: Sift the chaff away, seek the grain here.
The happiness known by awareness! - Dear Rāma.
